description: High-level overview of the Shopify app architecture, including the product creation workflow, image management system, and option customization features
Detailed documentation of the core data models including ProductSetDataLPC, ProductImage, OptionSet, and their relationships, focusing on the database schema design and model interactions
Comprehensive documentation of the dual-upload system for Cloudinary and Google Drive, including folder structures, file naming conventions, and image update workflows
Detailed documentation of the product creation process, including shape selection, variant generation, price calculations, and the complete data flow from form submission to database storage
Documentation of the custom option creation system, including option types, rules engine, conditional display logic, and integration with Shopify collections
